Detailed Description

template<typename Array1, typename Array2, typename Array3, typename IndexType = typename Array1::value_type, typename ValueType = typename Array3::value_type, typename MemorySpace = typename cusp::minimum_space<typename Array1::memory_space, typename Array2::memory_space, typename Array3::memory_space>::type>
class cusp::csr_matrix_view< Array1, Array2, Array3, IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace >

csr_matrix_view : Compressed Sparse Row matrix view

Template Parameters:
Array1 Type of row_offsets array view
Array2 Type of column_indices array view
Array3 Type of values array view
IndexType Type used for matrix indices (e.g. int).
ValueType Type used for matrix values (e.g. float).
MemorySpace A memory space (e.g. cusp::host_memory or cusp::device_memory)
